Comedians like Alina Pușcău, a veteran of Romanian Comedy TV or Andreea Bălan and her Cuc Arde In Vara crew were huge successes by that time. Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover and mentally unstable classmate Laura (Rachel McAdams). This is essentially a story about young love so the focus is definitely on the turmoil and tribulations of complex and often ambiguous relationships. This is a compelling, troubling, and ultimately a poetic film.
